description:
Luffy, Bartolomeo, and Desire make their way up the mineshaft, but Bill`s assassin, Peseta, has other plans! Just when the going gets tough, help arrives, and Zoro battles the assassin head on!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: In der Hitze des Gefechts – Law und Zorro eilen zur Hilfe!
Kengi Hakunetsu: Law Zoro Tsui ni Kenzan!
La technique à l`épée explose. Law et Zoro, prêts pour la rencontre finale !
The Sword Technique Heats Up! Law and Zoro Finally Appear!
Разогрев Стиля Мечей! Появление Ло и Зоро!"
تتأجّج مهارات السّيف! يظهر لو وزورو أخيرًا!
剣技白熱 ロー・ゾロ遂に見参!
